profile.education: Harvard University graduate in Computer Science and Economics

positions.경제: Advocates for deregulation in housing markets and enhancing local economies through active policies
positions.정치개혁: Suggests constitutional amendments to decentralize presidential powers
positions.교육: Emphasizes education reform aligning curriculums with market needs
positions.외교안보: Focuses on strengthening alliances with the US

positions.교육: Supports existing frameworks with traditional values

attackPoints: Seen as outdated by younger liberals
weakPoints: Lack of appeal on progressive reforms

debateConflict.background: Scheduled debate between Lee Jun-seok and Jeon Han-gil was canceled.
debateConflict.leePosition: Advocates for open debates, blames Jeon for avoiding issues.
debateConflict.jeonPosition: Claims structural issues and internal pressures led to cancellation.
coreConflicts: Ideological differences on reforms and social issues
debateConflict.timeline: Scheduled for February 2026, canceled following disputes.

suggestedTopics.label: Dynamics of new parties in South Korea
Impact of debate cancellations on public perceptions
Comparison of reformist versus traditional policies
